author: Angus Loten
title: Public-Sector Tech Faces Crush of Coronavirus-Linked Demands - The Wall Street Journal
description: A surge in filings for unemployment benefits overwhelmed websites in New York, Colorado, Oregon and other states
content: Public-sector technology leaders are balancing efforts to update aging information-technology systems with more urgent needs sparked by the coronavirus pandemic, including supporting overwhelmed online services, state and federal chief information officers sa… [+5441 chars]
